name: Pinewood B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was not very sure what to expect from a three star B and B as have not previously experienced such accommodation.
reviews.title: Clean, reasonably priced rooms in quiet location

reviews.text: What we got was a clean fresh room with a good bed, Plenty of hot water in the bathroom. There was a TV and the makings of tea and coffee.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others have said there was a very reasonable cooked breakfast together with toast and cereal or canned grapefruit.
reviews.title: Very relaxing place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What there was not were toiletries and Internet connection if the latter is important.
reviews.title: good value for money!

description: We are just 350 yards from the beach and inn at Wisemans Bridge with direct access to the Pembrokeshire Coastal Footpath and Celtic Cycleway between the lovely resorts of Amroth and Saundersfoot. We are in a stunningly beautiful location, very quiet and peaceful with majestic views over Pleasant Valley and across Saundersfoot Bay to Caldey Island. Impeccably clean and restful establishment with caring on-site owners.
